00028     public function indexAction()
00029     {
00030         $this->getView()->json = json_encode(array(
00031             array(
00032                 'page' => 'get',
00033                 'data' => array('search', 'admin')
00034             ),
00035             array(
00036                 'page' => 'post',
00037                 'data' => array('newcat', 'deletecat', 'admin-cats')
00038             )
00039         ));
00040     }

00048     public function getAction()
00049     {
00050         $json = json_encode(array());
00051         if ($this->_requests->hasGet()) {
00052             if ($this->_requests->gets()->data == 'search') {
00053                 $text = ($this->_requests->gets()->text) ? str_replace('*', '%', str_replace('%', '', $this->_requests->gets()->text)) : null;
00054                 $pg = ($this->_requests->gets()->pg) ? str_replace('*', '%', str_replace('%', '', $this->_requests->gets()->pg)) : null;
00055                 $year = ($this->_requests->gets()->year) ? str_replace('*', '%', str_replace('%', '', $this->_requests->gets()->year)) : null;
00056                 $json = array(
00057                     'terms' => array(
00058                         'text' => $text,
00059                         'pg' => $pg,
00060                         'year' => $year
00061                     ),
00062                     'data' => $this->_getModel()->getSearchPictures($text, $pg, $year)
00063                 );
00064             } elseif ($this->_requests->gets()->data == 'tags') {
00065                 if ($this->_requests->gets()->field == 'name') {
00066                     $tmp_arr = array();
00067                     foreach($this->_getModel()->getTags() as $tag)
00068                         $tmp_arr[] = $tag->name;
00069                     $json = $tmp_arr;
00070                 } else {
00071                     $json = $this->_getModel()->getTags();
00072                 }
00073             } elseif ($this->_requests->gets()->data == 'photographers') {
00074                 $json = array();
00075                 foreach($this->_getModel()->getPgs() as $pg)
00076                     $json[] = $pg->name;
00077             } elseif ($this->_requests->gets()->data == 'admin' && Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00078                 if ($this->_requests->gets()->subdata == 'cats') {
00079                     $cats = Galleria_Element_Category::create($this->_getModel()->getCats());
00080                     $json = (object) array(
00081                         'requestFirstIndex' => 0,
00082                         'firstIndex' => 0,
00083                         'count' => Galleria_Element_Category::howMany($cats),
00084                         'totalCount' => Galleria_Element_Category::howMany($cats),
00085                         'columns' => array('Name'),
00086                         'items' => Galleria_Element_Category::jsonFormat($cats)
00087                     );
00088                 } elseif ($this->_requests->gets()->subdata == 'catgroups') {
00089                     $json = array(
00090                         'state' => 'success',
00091                         'groups' => $this->_getModel()->getGroupsFromCat($this->_requests->gets()->catid),
00092                         'allgroups' => $this->_getModel()->getGroups()
00093                     );
00094                 } elseif ($this->_requests->gets()->subdata == 'usergroups') {
00095                     $json = array(
00096                         'state' => 'success',
00097                         'groupsin' => $this->_getModel()->getGroupsFromUser($this->_requests->gets()->userid),
00098                         'groupsout' => $this->_getModel()->getGroupsFromUser($this->_requests->gets()->userid, false)
00099                     );
00100                 } elseif ($this->_requests->gets()->subdata == 'piccats') {
00101                     $json = $this->_getModel()->getCats();
00102                 } elseif ($this->_requests->gets()->subdata == 'changelog' && ($pid = $this->_requests->gets()->pid)) {
00103                     $json = $this->_getModel()->getChangelog($pid);
00104                 }
00105             }
00106         }
00107         $this->getView()->json = json_encode($json);
00108     }

00116     public function postAction()
00117     {
00118         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup() && $posts = $this->_requests->posts()) {
00119             if ($cat = $posts->newcat) {
00120                 $result = $this->_getModel()->addCat($cat);
00121             } elseif ($cat = $posts->deletecat) {
00122                 $result = $this->_getModel()->deleteCat($cat);
00123             } elseif ($gid = $posts->delgroup) {
00124                 $result = $this->_getModel()->deleteGroup($gid);
00125             } elseif ($uid = $posts->deleteuser) {
00126                 $result = $this->_getModel()->deleteUser($uid);
00127             } elseif ($pid = $posts->deletepic) {
00128                 if ($result = $this->_getModel()->deletePic($pid))
00129                     Galleria_Image::deleteFiles($pid);
00130             } elseif ($gid = $posts->grantadmin) {
00131                 $result = $this->_getModel()->groupAdmin($gid, true);
00132             } elseif ($gid = $posts->dropadmin) {
00133                 $result = $this->_getModel()->groupAdmin($gid, false);
00134             } elseif ($uid = $posts->activateuser) {
00135                 $result = $this->_getModel()->userActivity($uid, true);
00136             } elseif ($uid = $posts->deactivateuser) {
00137                 $result = $this->_getModel()->userActivity($uid, false);
00138             } elseif ($pid = $posts->showpic) {
00139                 $result = $this->_getModel()->pictureVisibility($pid, true);
00140             } elseif ($pid = $posts->hidepic) {
00141                 $result = $this->_getModel()->pictureVisibility($pid, false);
00142             } elseif (($pid = $posts->changedesc) && ($text = $posts->text)) {
00143                 $result = $this->_getModel()->changeDesc($pid, $text);
00144             } elseif (($pid = $posts->changepg) && ($text = $posts->text)) {
00145                 $result = $this->_getModel()->changePg($pid, $text);
00146             } elseif (($pid = $posts->changeyear) && ($text = $posts->text)) {
00147                 $result = $this->_getModel()->changeYear($pid, $text);
00148             } elseif (($pid = $posts->addtag) && ($text = $posts->text)) {
00149                 $result = (count($text) <= 20) ? (($data = $this->_getModel()->addTag($pid, $text)) ? $data : false) : false;
00150             } elseif (($pid = $posts->changecat) && ($cid = $posts->cat)) {
00151                 $result = $this->_getModel()->changeCat($pid, $cid);
00152             } elseif (($pid = $posts->deletepictag) && ($tid = $posts->tid)) {
00153                 $result = $this->_getModel()->deletePicTag($pid, $tid);
00154             } elseif ($posts->data == 'catgroups') {
00155                 $result = $this->_getModel()->saveCatGroups($this->_parseCatGroups($posts->groups), $posts->catid);
00156             } elseif ($posts->data == 'addusergroup') {
00157                 $result = $this->_getModel()->addUserInGroup($posts->uid, $posts->gid);
00158             } elseif ($posts->data == 'delusergroup') {
00159                 $result = $this->_getModel()->delUserInGroup($posts->uid, $posts->gid);
00160             } elseif ($cats = $posts->{'admin-cats'}) {
00161                 $result = $this->_getModel()->saveCats($this->_parseCatsToArray($cats['items']));
00162             } else {
00163                 $result = true;
00164             }
00165         } else {
00166             $result = false;
00167         }
00168         $this->getView()->result = json_encode($result);
00169     }
00170 
00177     public function before()
00178     {
00179         $this->getView()->setRenderLayout(false);
00180         return true;
00181     }
00182 
00191     private function _parseCatGroups($data)
00192     {
00193         $groups = array();
00194         foreach (explode('&', $data) as $group) {
00195             $groups[] = (int) str_replace('groups=', '', $group);
00196         }
00197         return $groups;
00198     }
00199 
00209     private function _parseCatsToArray($cats, $parent = null)
00210     {
00211         $result = array();
00212         foreach ($cats as $weight => $cat) {
00213             $result[] = (object) array(
00214                 'id' => (int) $cat['id'],
00215                 'parent' => $parent,
00216                 'weight' => $weight
00217             );
00218             if (isset($cat['children']))
00219                 $result = array_merge($result, $this->_parseCatsToArray($cat['children'], (int) $cat['id']));
00220         }
00221         return $result;
00222     }
